nodes.text: Miller was a female Human Sergeant of the Galactic Republic living during the Galactic War. Following the Battle of Asylum she travelled to Odessen and joined the Alliance against the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. She was assigned to the military branch of the Alliance under former Republic Admiral Bey'wan Aygo.
Sergeant Miller appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as a Trooper vendor in the Alliance base on Odessen.
